name: Between the rooms
description:
-Who were you? Where are you? How much time were you here? You feel like you are stuck for days in this endless hallway, many strange sounds start echoing through the hallway, sometimes you even feel like someone or something is watching you.  As you run after each rest , closer and closer, to the darkness at the end of the hallway, the lights start to go off behind you, one by one. Thirsty, hungry and scared you decided to run one last time. . . And there it was, after all this time, a door, waiting to be opened. You felt relief, but as you open it total darkness takes over. Feeling of presence and incredible fear takes over, lights in front of you turn on showing the same hallway, but something feels different . . .  You are not alone . . . 

-This story can end in 3 ways

-Music and edits by Caki Bell 

-His channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCteR5bUAR3_r2WOsKL6fF-w/featured (He makes amazing no copyright music please check it out!)
